recipe.title: Pot-Brewed Coffee with Raw Sugar and Spices (Café de Olla)
ingredients: 4-5 ounces piloncillo*, roughly chopped or 1/2 to 2/3 cup packed brown sugar, plus 1 teaspoon molasses
2/3 cup (2 ounces) Viennese-roast coffee, medium to coarse grind
*Unrefined sugar that is pressed into cone or disk shapes. Also called panela.
instructions: Boiling and steeping: In a noncorrosive pan, combine 1 quart water, the sugar, cinnamon and optional aniseed. Bring slowly to a boil, stirring to melt the sugar. Stir in the coffee, remove from the fire, cover and steep for 5 minutes.
Straining: Strain the coffee through a fine-mesh sieve into cups or mugs and serve immediately.
